Aggressive Armament: Maneuver
sky-based weaponary and your funnels
to crush your enemies.

funnels and win by versatility.

add 1 Funnel Matrix

Carmen Cantat: A beloved vessel
draws sympathy from higher places.

Friendship strengthens the
bound and builds up sturdy mind.

Vampire's Shroud: Right hand
for sword and left hand for magic.

Spectre Dance: Mastery over one
single technique is enough to
take them all.

Acquisition Requirements:

Midsummer Swimsuit: Warp the time
around you to rain daggers
on your foes.

Sapor Peregrinus: Wield telekinetic sword
with your magia and launch
relentless attacks.

Bonus: Peripheral circuit is planted to
avert Magiam Obruor.

Acquisition Requirements:
Defeat Corrupt Heart with Mors Universi.

not the soul fenced within.
Bonus: Mens mala in corpore sano.

Composite Shield developed by Shion

TEXT: After finishing a battle, click the #yIcon to enter #ySkill #yTree UI. You may spend skill points here to obtain permanent buffs.
Skill points are gained by defeating Elite and Boss enemies.
Try hard to hunt down powerful enemies as to develop the strength of characters.
Every single Funnel deals active damage at the start of your turn as well as applying effects based on its type.
The active damage and the effects are augmented as you invest skill points in certain skills.
Upon filling up 16 #yMatrix #yCharges, 8 times of Funnel attacks are launched.
#yMatrix #yCharges are gained from playing certain cards and the effects of certain powers.
Try to activate the Funnel as much as possible.
Stiffness is gained from playing certain Attacks. Upon reaching 4, you turn is ended.
Stiffness may be alleviated by playing certain cards.
Magiam Obruor is gained from playing certain cards, mostly Magia themed. You lose 1 Energy next turn for each of Magiam Obruor you have this turn.
This negative impact may be alleviated as you invest skill points in certain skills.
Try to regulate the Stiffness and Magiam Obruor you gained, and always calculate before playing such cards.
In #yPraying #yStance, you gain buffs for several turns by playing #yPrayer cards.
In #yJudging #yStance, special cards are added into your hand by playing #yPrayer cards.
Try to assess the situation for entering #yJudging #yStance as to obtain different helps from #yPrayer cards.
Each #yConstruct #yRecharge blocks incoming damage. The amount of blockable damage is augmented with #yImpact #yAbsorption.
#yConstrcut #yRecharge is restored with #yRecycle, which may be gained by playing certain cards.
An Elf companion is summoned by playing a certain card.
Until the Elf perishes, all incoming damage is targeted towards it. You may protect the Elf by granting #yCover, which may be gained by playing certain cards.
Try to restore #yConstruct #Recharge, support the Elf and in doing so, have the Elf supporting you back.
#yFusion is accumulated by playing certain cards. Upon reaching 3, add 1 #yTime #yRift, a special Attack, into your hand.
Once you have played #yTime #yRift for twice, add 1 #yParadox, a powerful Attack, into your hand.
Try to gain #yFusion as much as you can as to smash the enemies with powerful attacks.
